reviews.review_msg: Thomas is a great professor. His way of teaching is quite unique and effective. It's clear that he truly enjoys his job and wants his students to succeed. He makes all the complex concepts relatively easier. Whatever I learned from his lectures, I know I'd never forget. This professor is a gem. :)

Thomas was friendly and approachable. He values a hard-working student. The lectures were amazing and he provided a lot of examples to support economic concepts. Constantly looked for feedback from students regarding his lecture quality. Exams were reasonable as he included the chapter materials in lecture slides and tutorials.
Although he is a new professor, this does not affect his teaching attitude in the slightest. Give students good feedback and discuss interesting things with students after class.
